entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
